text: pasuva api (adamta sahakariya vasayen ohuge bharyayava utpadanaya kara, adamta) “o adam! oba, obage birinda samaga mema uyanehi vasaya karanu. oba dedena mehi kæmati sthanayaka (kæmati dæyak) onæ taram anubhava karanu. namut oba me gasata lam novanu! lam vuvahot oba dedenama (obata) napurak kara gat aya bavata pat vannehuya!” yayi kivemu
